trans-unit.source: The OneCommander Connector is an experimental standalone utility to help connect OC with system Open and Save dialogs of other programs. A small window will appear under a compatible open/save dialog to let you set its folder to the path opened in OneCommander. It runs independently from OC.
trans-unit.target: Priključek OneCommander je eksperimentalni samostojni pripomoček za pomoč pri povezovanju OC s sistemskimi pogovornimi okni Odpri in shrani drugih programov. Pod združljivim pogovornim oknom za odpiranje / shranjevanje se prikaže majhno okno, ki vam omogoča, da mapo nastavite na pot, odprto v OneCommanderju. Deluje neodvisno od OK.

trans-unit.source: Connector started. To test, close this settings window, open Notepad and then click File->Open to see it in action
trans-unit.target: Priključek se je zagnal. Če želite preskusiti, zaprite to okno z nastavitvami, odprite beležnico in kliknite Datoteka->Odpri, da si ogledate delovanje

trans-unit.source: This will download OneCommanderConnector.exe from OneCommander.com website. Since this utility starts with an invisible window and monitors when an Open or Save dialog window opens, an antivirus software may complain that it is suspicious. It is safe but if you have concerns please contact support.
trans-unit.target: S tem boste prenesli OneCommanderConnector.exe s OneCommander.com spletnega mesta. Ker se ta pripomoček začne z nevidnim oknom in spremlja, ko se odpre pogovorno okno Odpri ali Shrani, se lahko protivirusna programska oprema pritoži, da je sumljiva. Varno je, če pa imate pomisleke, se obrnite na podporo.
trans-unit.note: Dialog that opens when user clicks to download connector

trans-unit.source: Environment PATH added. Other programs might need to be restarted to get the updated variables.
trans-unit.target: Okolje PATH dodan. Druge programe boste morda morali znova zagnati, da boste dobili posodobljene spremenljivke.
trans-unit.note: PATH is Windows variable so it should stay untranslated (or keep in brackets)

trans-unit.source: Program registed as the default files manager. [NEWLINE]If you ever need to uninstall or move the program, [BOLDSTART]you must unregister it first! [BOLDEND]
trans-unit.target: Program se je uveljavil kot privzeti upravitelj datotek. [NOVA VRSTICA] Če boste kdaj morali odstraniti ali premakniti program, ga morate najprej preklicati iz registracije! [KREPKO]
trans-unit.note: Dialog shown after user sets OC as default file manager

trans-unit.note: Message on click on Clear local thubmnail database button in settings

trans-unit.source: Proceed to terminate explorer.exe, delete Windows thumbnail cache files, and then restart explorer.exe? This will terminate all ongoing file operations!!!
trans-unit.target: Nadaljujte z ukinitvijo raziskovalca.exe izbrišite datoteke predpomnilnika sličic sistema Windows in nato znova zaženite raziskovalca.exe? S tem boste prekinili vse tekoče operacije datotek!!

trans-unit.source: Important: This is an [BOLDSTART]experimental feature[BOLDEND] that will edit your Registry to make OneCommander the default file manager and folder handler (Open/Save dialogs cannot be replaced). [NEWLINE][BOLDSTART]This will make Windows File Explorer unusable[BOLDEND] - even when clicking a folder in File Explorer the OneCommander will open. [NEWLINE]You will need to [BOLDSTART]unregister it[BOLDEND] by unchecking this option if you ever move or remove OneCommander (uninstalling it will not reverse changes)![NEWLINE]This will also enable running in the background for faster window opening.[NEWLINE]Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed and you know how to restore the registry on your own if something fails (no support in case of recovery)?
trans-unit.target: Pomembno: To je poskusna funkcija [BOLDSTART][BOLDEND], ki bo uredila vaš register, da bo OneCommander privzeti upravitelj datotek in rutina za obravnavo map (pogovornih oken za odpiranje/shranjevanje ni mogoče zamenjati). [NOVA VRSTICA] [KREPKI ZAČETEK] Tako bo Windows File Explorer neuporaben[BOLDEND] - tudi če kliknete mapo v Raziskovalcu, se bo odprl OneCommander. [NOVA VRSTICA] Odjaviti ga boste morali [BOLDSTART][BOLDEND] tako, da počistite to možnost, če kdaj premaknete ali odstranite OneCommander (odstranitev ne bo obrnila sprememb)! [NOVA VRSTICA] To bo omogočilo tudi izvajanje v ozadju za hitrejše odpiranje oken. [NOVA VRSTICA] Ali ste popolnoma prepričani, da želite nadaljevati in veste, kako sami obnoviti register, če nekaj ne uspe (brez podpore v primeru obnovitve)?
trans-unit.note: Message after clicking register as default file manager button in settings

trans-unit.source: Existing settings file from the Microsoft Store version of the program has been found.[NEWLINE]Do you want to import all settings into this version?
trans-unit.target: Najdena je bila obstoječa datoteka z nastavitvami iz različice programa Microsoft Store. [NOVA VRSTICA] Ali želite uvoziti vse nastavitve v to različico?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to download the latest version and reinstall? Settings will not be affected.
trans-unit.target: Ali želite prenesti najnovejšo različico in jo znova namestiti? To ne bo vplivalo na nastavitve.

trans-unit.source: Do you want to [BOLDSTART]restart program now[BOLDEND] to apply all changes?[NEWLINE]This will cancel all ongoing operations initiated by OneCommander
trans-unit.target: Ali želite [BOLDSTART]znova zagnati program zdaj[BOLDEND], da uveljavite vse spremembe? [NOVA VRSTICA] S tem boste preklicali vse tekoče operacije, ki jih je sprožil OneCommander
trans-unit.note: When closing settings window after changing settings requiring restart

trans-unit.source: Important: This is an [BOLDSTART]experimental feature[BOLDEND] that will edit Windows Registry to completely replace Windows File Explorer Win+E hotkey. This registry change will make OneCommander open when clicking Explorer shortcut, but won't disable navigation within Explorer. The only way to reverse this is by unchecking this button from OneCommander or running the registry script from OneCommander folder (uninstalling OC won't change it automatically). [NEWLINE]Proceed?
trans-unit.target: Pomembno: To je poskusna funkcija [BOLDSTART][BOLDEND], ki bo uredila register sistema Windows, da bo v celoti nadomestila bližnjico Win+E v Raziskovalcu. Ta sprememba registra bo odprla OneCommander, ko kliknete bližnjico Raziskovalca, vendar ne bo onemogočila krmarjenja v Raziskovalcu. Edini način, da to obrnete, je, da počistite ta gumb iz OneCommanderja ali zaženete registrski skript iz mape OneCommander (odstranitev OC ga ne bo samodejno spremenila). [NOVA VRSTICA] Nadaljuje?
trans-unit.note: Message after clicking register Win+E shortcut button in settings

trans-unit.source: Program has crashed because some other software is accessing OneCommander's files.[NEWLINE]If [BOLDSTART]{0}[BOLDEND] folder is a part of an automated file sync or a cloud backup you will need to close OneCommander and move the entire program folder to a different location. [NEWLINE]If an antivirus or other security software scans the program folder at the time when DLL is being loaded, it can also cause a crash.
trans-unit.target: Program se je zrušil, ker nekatera druga programska oprema dostopa do datotek OneCommander. [NOVA VRSTICA] Če je mapa [BOLDSTART]{0}[BOLDEND] del avtomatizirane sinhronizacije datotek ali varnostne kopije v oblaku, boste morali zapreti OneCommander in premakniti celotno programsko mapo na drugo mesto. [NOVA VRSTICA] Če protivirusna ali druga varnostna programska oprema pregleda programsko mapo v času, ko se naloži DLL, lahko povzroči tudi zrušitev.

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
